alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crawford; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 19 at 8:19PM CDT until April 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SAC...NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD AND NORTHWESTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles east of Kiron, or 14 miles northeast of Denison, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Wall Lake and Wall Lake Municipal Airport. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
